summary:
Increases the damage of your Expert level desctruction bolt spells by a factor of two,
for higher level mage characters.
descriptionHtml:
This mod tweaks the standard Incinerate, Thunderbolt, and Icy Spear spells to do twice as much damage as they currently do. I was growing tired of being a level 55 mage and having to spam 10-15 bolts into higher level targets to kill them. This mod doubles the damage of the bolts, making lower level targets a breeze, but still allowing for higher level mobs to be a challenge, albeit a less repetitive and annoying one.

It\'s relatively easy to tweak the damage on most spells, so if you have any requests for future updates feel free to leave a comment!

Install
=======
1. Copy the .esp file to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp file from Skyrim\\Data\\

History
=======
1.0, 11/25/2011 - Initial release.
1.2 11/27/2011 - Updated Greater Ward and Vampiric Drain
Contact
=======
None.

Credits
=======
